name: vue-hybrid-bridge-demo
description: Vue3 Host + Vue2 Legacy iframe integration with URL token authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently -n vue3,vue2 -c blue,green "npm run dev:vue3" "npm run dev:vue2"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared-bridge && npm run build -w packages/vue3-host && npm run build -w packages/vue2-legacy
